import React from 'react' import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar'; import './Profile.css' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' function Profile() { const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; return (

Saba Marghania

{userInfo?.username}

@{userInfo?.username}

) } export default Profile
